segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a total mess, and it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring out of the sink like that, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the dirty puddleâ€” who knows what's on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, clueless, with wet cabinets dripping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids climbing for cookies? Filthy hands in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling, probably covered in grime too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, begging for a soggy cookie maybe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflowing sinks are the worst; it smells musty already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, waiting to get splashed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a clean garden, but inside it's revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing food stolen like that either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes my stomach turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Clean it up before it gets worse!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids and water don't mix well in chaos like this.
segments.speaker: PAR
